name: Escape The Midnight Man
description:
This game is a game jam entry for the Godot Wild Jam 50. This is also my first game.  The game jam theme was ritual.

The day is the 31st of October and you have decided to explore an abandoned bunker in the local area. Whilst there you decided to summon the Midnight Man. You begin by wright your name on paper and adding a drop of blood to it. Knocking on the entrance door to the bunker you begin to feel a presence in the area and enter the bunker. However something went wrong and you have angered the Midnight Man and now find yourself being hunted by the Midnight Man. 

Explore the dark bunker whilst being chased by the ghostly apparition and find the key cards needed to open the doors to the bunker. Use any method you can to escape the Midnight Man; jump on tables, crawl in to the gaps in the wall and run to try and outrun him.
